title: Into the Glorious Unknown
description: Escape to Italy, travel to France... And once you've seen enough, pick another destination.Anything is possible in this feel-good novel! Try different food, different clothes, different jobs... And maybe even different relationships?Too young to look for love, Alice is looking for experience. She wants to explore the world, live her dreams and discover her sexuality. But will everything be as easy as she imagines it to be? How long can she flit from city to city and make it work? Will there be consequences?Join her adventure now!
author: Anna Leva
